svg.title: CE-16: Evolutionary Codebase Transformation Visualizer
svg.desc: Advanced 3D-style visualization showing codebase evolution over time with AI-driven transformation tracking, architectural improvement timelines, and technical debt reduction pathways

g.text: Keyboard Navigation: Tab for controls, Space to play/pause, Arrow keys for timeline, Enter for detailed views
Screen Reader: 3D evolution timeline with interactive controls, metrics dashboard, and predictive modeling
